body.p:
Steamer Bostonia March 18th/64
John L. Scott Esqr
Dear Sir

I want you to wright to Venerble at Frankfort and have him to go-to the Governor and get me a recqusition to the Governor of indiana for alexandrew Burk as-I have ascertained that he is in That State again and also tell venerble to have all those Seals that is Necessary So i will not be troubled against tell him to attend to it. to it immediately and i will pay all expense & charges as soon as i See you do not fail to attend to this wright off for I want to get him by circuit court at carrollton you must excuse this bad wrighting as The boat Shakes So i cannot half wright i hope you will wright to me & let me know whether you will can have it all fixed without with out me
going to frankfort or not as
P.S. i learned yesterday that a your child was sick from a gentleman in cincinnati you will ^pleas^ let me know in your letter how it is getting along

Indiana
Requisition for Alexd. Burk & Wm Sams
apptd Agent
21st Mch /64
